statements: SELECT * FROM medication_inventory;
SELECT id, medication_name, quantity FROM medication_inventory;
SELECT medication_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM medication_inventory;
SELECT id, medication_name, expiration_date FROM medication_inventory;
SELECT id, quantity, expiration_date FROM medication_inventory ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT medication_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM medication_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM medication_inventory WHERE medication_name LIKE '%Aspirin%' AND quantity < 50;
SELECT medication_name, expiration_date FROM medication_inventory WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT id, medication_name, quantity FROM medication_inventory WHERE expiration_date > '2023-06-30' ORDER BY medication_name DESC, expiration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM medication_inventory WHERE expiration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Medications WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, quantity FROM Medications WHERE name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT * FROM Medications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM Medications ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory INNER JOIN Medications ON Inventory.medication_id = Medications.id WHERE Inventory.quantity < 10;
SELECT * FROM Medications WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM Medications WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT id, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT name, quantity, expiration_date FROM Medications JOIN Inventory ON Medications.id = Inventory.medication_id WHERE Inventory.restock_date > '2023-12-31'
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE restock_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-06-30' ORDER BY restock_date
SELECT * FROM medication_inventory;
SELECT medication_name, quantity FROM medication_inventory;
SELECT id, medication_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM medication_inventory ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM medication_locations WHERE location_name = 'Pharmacy';
SELECT location_id, location_name, location_address FROM medication_locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM medication_inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC
SELECT medication_name, quantity FROM medication_inventory WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01'
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM medication_locations WHERE location_name LIKE '%Pharmacy%'
SELECT restock_date, restocked_quantity FROM restock_history WHERE restocked_quantity >= 50 ORDER BY restock_date ASC
SELECT medication_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM medication_inventory WHERE expiration_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31'
SELECT * FROM medication_inventory;
SELECT medication_name, quantity FROM medication_inventory WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-09-01';
SELECT id, medication_name, quantity FROM medication_inventory ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM medication_locations WHERE location_name LIKE 'M%' ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM medication_suppliers;
SELECT * FROM medication_inventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT medication_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM medication_inventory WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-01-01' AND expiration_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT mi.medication_name, ml.location_name, rh.restock_date FROM medication_inventory mi JOIN restocking_history rh ON mi.id = rh.medication_id JOIN medication_locations ml ON ml.location_id = rh.location_id ORDER BY rh.restock_date DESC;

SELECT ms.supplier_name, COUNT(rh.restock_id) AS total_restocks FROM medication_suppliers ms LEFT JOIN restocking_history rh ON ms.supplier_id = rh.supplier_id GROUP BY ms.supplier_name HAVING COUNT(rh.restock_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM medication_inventory WHERE expiration_date IS NULL OR expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT medication_name, quantity FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT location_name, address FROM locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT inventory_id, location_id, quantity FROM inventory WHERE medication_id = 3;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT medication_name, quantity FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' AND quantity < 50;
SELECT location_name, address FROM locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT inventory_id, SUM(quantity) as total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY inventory_id HAVING total_quantity > 500;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Health%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
